segments.text: Put all baggage on the conveyor belt . Walk through the detector age one at a time , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , ma'ma . Could you walk back through the doorway again , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Airport security . Could you empty your pockets over here , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I'm in a hurry . All right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm embarrassed ! I forgot completely about them . I'm terribly sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . Enjoy your flight .
segments.speaker: S2
